Docs.typeparam: The stage of the application gateway definition to return to after attaching this definition.
Docs.summary: The stage of an application gateway request routing rule definition allowing to add an address to specify an existing backend to associate with this request routing rule or create a new backend with an auto-generated name and addresses to it.
